post.author: Admin
post.title: Senior Band Night, State Finals and Such
post.description: Congrats for earning a ‘SUPERIOR’ rating at Copley! On to Brunswick contest on Saturday: Performance
post.content:
Congrats for earning a ‘SUPERIOR’ rating at Copley! On to Brunswick contest on Saturday: Performance time: 7:45pm

Fruit Sale Forms Are Due!

Personal Fruit Sale order forms are DUE NO later than October 18th. Once you have completed your sales, place your order with payments in the WHITE Band Box Attention: Jaime Poplin or Heidi Cmich. Any questions? Contact Jaime: 440-457-7417 or Heidi: 216-224-2968

DVD and CD Order Form for the 2017 State Finals and Marching Band Concert!

The Boosters will be offering two ways to remember the 2017 Marching Band season! In conjunction with SoundWaves of Cleveland, we will be offering a DVD of State Finals (the ONLY way to get a hard copy of the performance) and a CD recording of our Marching Band Concert! Please complete the attached order form and place your order in the white band box by NOV 3rd. We will only be ordering EXACTLY what we need… no extras!! Questions? Please contact: Amanda Kost: 440-864-6543

Volunteers Needed for Senior Band Night!

We are EXTREMELY short of volunteers for Senior Band Night…. Please consider volunteering a few hours of your time… our Senior parents will be enjoying a dinner with their bando as recognition for their four years of supporting the band program.
50/50
Concessions
Senior Band Night

Chaperones Needed

We are in need of chaperones for BOTH Brunswick Contest AND State Finals. Please consider volunteering for these events. You never have to worry about parking when you chaperone!

Volunteer Button on Band Booster Webpage

An easy, one-stop volunteer location is now on the homepage of the Band Booster website. Click here to see every event this going on with open volunteer opportunities!

Mark Your Calendar!

  • OCT 18 – FRUIT SALE ORDERS ARE DUE!
  • OCT 20 – HOME – Nordonia -- SENIOR BAND NIGHT
  • OCT 21 – Contest – Brunswick – Performance time: 7:45pm
  • OCT 27 – HOME – Cuyahoga Falls
  • OCT 28 – STATES – HILLIARD DARBY HS – Performance time: 1:30pm
  • OCT 30 – BOOSTER MEETING – MEDIA CENTER @ 7PM
  • NOV 1 – Final Marching Band Concert – Gym 1 @ 7pm
